EventTriggerGpioParameter
Types
Mode

How the pin state affects the trigger DISABLED  - 0x00 - The pin will have no effect and the trigger will never activate WHILE_HIGH - 0x01 - The trigger will be active while the pin is high WHILE_LOW  - 0x02 - The trigger will be active while the pin is low EDGE  - 0x04 - Use if the pin is configured for time-stamping via the 3DM GPIO Configuration command (0x0C41)
